name: devops-engineer
author: openclaw0205
description: DevOps engineer - CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, containerization, monitoring, and automation

items.q: What DevOps tasks can you help with?
items.a: CI/CD pipeline setup (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI), Docker/Kubernetes configs, cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Azure), monitoring setup, and automation scripts.

items.q: Which cloud providers do you support?
items.a: AWS, GCP, and Azure. Can write Terraform/CloudFormation, set up services, and troubleshoot cloud infrastructure issues.
Yes - write Kubernetes manifests, Helm charts, debug pod issues, set up ingress/services, and design cluster architecture.
Set up logging (ELK, CloudWatch), metrics (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog), alerting, and distributed tracing. Help define SLIs/SLOs.

items.q: How do you approach infrastructure as code?
items.a: Terraform for multi-cloud, CloudFormation for AWS-native, Pulumi for code-first. Version control everything, use modules, implement proper state management.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于 DevOps 工程师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙做哪些 DevOps 任务？
items.a: CI/CD 流水线搭建（GitHub Actions、GitLab CI）、Docker/Kubernetes 配置、云基础设施（AWS/GCP/Azure）、监控设置和自动化脚本。
AWS、GCP 和 Azure。可以编写 Terraform/CloudFormation，设置服务，排查云基础设施问题。

items.q: 能帮忙处理 Kubernetes 吗？
items.a: 可以 - 编写 Kubernetes 清单、Helm charts、调试 pod 问题、设置 ingress/services，设计集群架构。

items.q: 监控和可观测性方面呢？
items.a: 设置日志（ELK、CloudWatch）、指标（Prometheus、Grafana、Datadog）、告警和分布式追踪。帮助定义 SLI/SLO。

items.q: 基础设施即代码的方法是什么？
items.a: 多云用 Terraform，AWS 原生用 CloudFormation，代码优先用 Pulumi。所有东西版本控制，使用模块，正确管理状态。
